components.name: boiler
components.description: Calculate total operation cost and emissions using a boiler to meet heating loads.

inputs.name: heating_loads
inputs.description: Heating loads [kWh]

inputs.name: carrier_cost
inputs.description: Cost of energy carrier [CHF/kWh]

inputs.name: carrier_emissions
inputs.description: Carbon emissions of energy carrier [kgCO2/kWheq.]

inputs.name: efficiency
inputs.description: Efficiency of boiler [-]

components.name: boiler-tr
components.description: Calculate time-resolved operating cost and emissions using a boiler to meet heating loads.

inputs.name: heating_loads
inputs.description: Heating loads, time resolved [kWh/h]

inputs.name: carrier_cost
inputs.description: Cost of energy carrier, time resolved [CHF/kWh]

inputs.name: carrier_emissions
inputs.description: Carbon emissions of energy carrier time resolved [kgCO2/kWheq.]

inputs.name: efficiency
inputs.description: Efficiency of boiler, time resolved [-/h]. Could change depending on supply temp.

components.name: chp
components.description: Calculate heating or electricity generation, cost and carbon from a CHP

inputs.name: htg_or_elec_in
inputs.description: Heating or electricity in as loads? {'heating_in', 'elec_in'}. (default: 'heating_in')

inputs.name: loads
inputs.description: Loads in [kWh]. Either heating or electricity loads that need to be supplied.

inputs.name: eta
inputs.description: Efficiency of CHP, i.e. from fuel into electricity [-]

inputs.name: htp
inputs.description: Heat-to-power ratio, i.e. how much heat comes with generated electricity [-]

inputs.name: fuelcost
inputs.description: Fuel cost [CHF/kWh]

inputs.name: fuelemissions
inputs.description: Fuel emissions [kgCO2/kWh]

components.name: chp-tr
components.description: Calculate time resolved heating or electricity generation, cost and carbon from a CHP

inputs.name: htg_or_elec_in
inputs.description: Heating or electricity in as loads? {'heating_in', 'elec_in'}. (default: 'heating_in')

inputs.name: loads
inputs.description: Loads in [kWh], time series. Either heating or electricity loads that need to be supplied.

inputs.name: eta
inputs.description: Efficiency of CHP, i.e. from fuel into electricity [-]

inputs.name: htp
inputs.description: Heat-to-power ratio, i.e. how much heat comes with generated electricity [-]

inputs.name: fuelcost
inputs.description: Fuel cost [CHF/kWh], time series

inputs.name: fuelemissions
inputs.description: Fuel emissions [kgCO2/kWh], time series

outputs.name: total_emissions
outputs.description: Time resolved carbon emissions from operation [kgCO2]

outputs.name: heating_gen
outputs.description: Time resolved heating energy generated from CHP [kWh]

outputs.name: elec_gen
outputs.description: Time resolved electricity generated from CHP [kWh]
